Everyone needs to understand ABGX will not confirm the file until the game is fully released. While the game has started shipping only those who pre-ordered have a disk and hopefully an ABGX goon will have one to verify this ISO against. It takes time to verify every nook and cranny of a video game disk to ensure complete accuracy and no faults ending in bans.
